website_summaries.verdict: One of the best premium pendant lights available on the market. Great for areas that need a large amount of light.
pros: Large amount of cuttable cord is great for higher or vaulted ceiling spaces
Glass is smooth and easy to clean when necessary
cons: More expensive than other globe pendant light options

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The large opening at the top of the glass shade has a rough edge, which could easily cut your hand when assembling the fixture or changing bulbs. Purchased same item from this co. 2-1/2 years ago & it was much better quality. Cannot use or recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Constant reader in Nor Cal

customer_reviews.title: Thinner glass, but good replacement for original mid-century modern globe
customer_reviews.text: A very good replacement for our broken original mid-century modern globe, however, the glass is much thinner than the original. While the glass is thinner, it still appears to be a good copy from the outside. The lighter weight is better for the track to which it is hanging, but I would have appreciated an exact replacement. Still happy with the globe.
customer_reviews.author: DLn

customer_reviews.title: Expectations Shattered
customer_reviews.text: I hired an electrician to install this ceiling light. There was a small, but necessary part missing. He had to drive to Home Depot to find the part. Of course, his fee increased because of that extra time. The box was not opened until he arrived to install it. It is not as attractive as it is in the picture. Hanging wire is bent in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice medium sized globe fixture
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to get this fixture! We built the house 30 plus years ago and have a fixture like this in the bathroom. We are expanding the bathroom and needed a second light fixture in there. I was stoked to find the exact same fixture! I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: liscubed

customer_reviews.title: Huge gap between the glass and the metal that covers ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge gap between the glass and the metal that covers the ill-fitting attachment mechanism. This light is junk, and it should be priced at about $9.99. I’m not joking, it’s really not worth half what they charge for it. The problem is there aren’t many simple globe pendants out there anymore.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Easy, normal, installation. Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: Simple, but nice light. Wife wanted this and it was cheaper than purchasing locally. Installed easily if you have every installed a light fixture. It's not clear in the pics but it DOES come with the white base plate to cover the wall recepticle
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great light. Goes well with our open concept kitchen-dining ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. Goes well with our open concept kitchen-dining area. Wanted something with a mid-century vibe for our kitchen. Took a star off as the white cover at the top of the light is slightly warped and isn't exactly flush with the glass globe in one area. This is facing a corner so it's not obvious but if I had this in a more exposed space I would likely have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But pay attention to instructions
customer_reviews.text: Read directions! I didn’t and had to redo twice, but that’s all on me... Looks terrific, looks waay more expensive that it was. Clean crisp white glass globe, I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: AMY W.

customer_reviews.title: Good, straightforward pendant
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Also used medallion (purchased separately). I like that I can put my own LED bulb in.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: it looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: there are no surprises with this light, it looks like the picture, i ordered 2 but one of the glass globes came broken, there isnt much padding in the box it is shipped in. i will see about getting another globe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ezzo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in a mid-century modern house
customer_reviews.text: We put this fixture in a stairway of a house we are selling (well, over the stairway) and it looks great... it's a mid-century modern house and this fixture fits in perfectly with that vibe, and looks more premium than the Ikea fixtures we usually use. Easy to install, excellent product. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Goldengate

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, real glass fixture. Easy to install and looks great in my home office. Four stars because it has a slight infection in that it is not perfectly round. If you look at it closely the bottom of the globe is slightly teardrop shaped. it appears to be a manufacturing defect, but not enough that I would send it back. My wife noticed only after I pointed it out. Nevertheless, I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome globe light
customer_reviews.text: We've used these lights in two different houses and absolutely love. They're one the less expensive quality hanging fixtures with a contemporary feel. Current have in our living, dining, breakfast, and foyer areas!
customer_reviews.author: Winston Parker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mid-century renovation. I'm still decorating, but they add just the right vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Globes have a manufacturing defect that leaves a raised lip ...
customer_reviews.text: Globes have a manufacturing defect that leaves a raised lip on the edge, which means the metal cap does not sit snug against the globe. I asked for a new set, which they sent free of charge, and the same defect is observed.
customer_reviews.author: Kmill

customer_reviews.title: Classic Style, Easy-to-Install
customer_reviews.text: A classic lighting fixture dating back decades. Well-built and easy to install. The single-screw canopy design in particular is very forgiving of uneven electrical boxes such as mine and the resulting install is very clean indeed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warnecke

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this light
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this light! Can I say that again?!? It's a great size, gives off perfect lighting, I would buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It isn't terrible and I can manage
customer_reviews.text: The white on the globe isn't consistent. There are some areas where it is brighter than the others and there is a visible "seam" down the middle when light shines through. It isn't terrible and I can manage, but it is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I bought this along with a ceiling medallion. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light. This most definitely updated our foyer! My husband installed it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light fixture, good quality. My electrician had no trouble trimming it to the right length and installing it. Looks great in my 1960's era house and really lights up the room very well.
customer_reviews.author: studio

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The cord is solid and holds the bulb well. With an (equivalent) 200W bulb, lights up entire dining room evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fits my 1958 home perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my kitchen as the primary light with a 150 watt CFL. This thing is bright! works very well to fill the room with task lighting.
customer_reviews.author: tringer82

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light!
customer_reviews.text: This gave our home a great, midcentury modern look to our entry way.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Light is better quality than I expected. We used an electrician so I can't speak to how easy or hard it was to install it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four of these pendant lights.. Had to exchange one because bottom of globe was dark (like burnt out bulb ). Had no problem with the exchange or exchanged product. We have them on dimmers and enjoy the warm glow to bright light that evenly bounces off the opal glass.
customer_reviews.author: Danah S.

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp...
customer_reviews.text: Great hanging light - perfect for the mid-century mod theme wife was going for. Shipped as expected, and was expertly packed (I was worried, but it was well padded). Way better than the tacky-brass-ghetto-chandelier it replaced...
customer_reviews.author: Josh L

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received a broken product. It was broken into many small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: RD99999

customer_reviews.title: soft light lots of watts
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lot of light that was non glaring. These are perfect, they look great and do the job. Easy to install and adjustable hanging length. A classic look. Overnight delivery,they were here early the next day.Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Morninbelle

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The two lights we purchased were what we were looking for, they were very similar to a light fixture we had a long time ago. One of the lights was broken when it arrived and was replaced in a timley manner.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Frascone

customer_reviews.title: SCORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had looked for months for one of these large globes to hang in our entry. I finally found a lighting store that could order it. Before I could order, I found the same light on Amazon.com 50.00 cheaper...AND free shipping!! Yay!!! It was shipped promptly, well packed, and is exactly what we wanted. SCORE!!
customer_reviews.author: jupha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fixture
customer_reviews.text: This affordable, modern fixture is easy to install and fills the room with light. Takes up to a 150-watt bulb. Suggestion: use with a dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crease

customer_reviews.title: elegant
customer_reviews.text: The light looks wonderful in our foyer. The size was perfect, the qulatiy is absolutely acceptable, would have only loved it in chrome/nickel/silver, instead of white. But even then, it's very nice, was easily installed, and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Less is more!
customer_reviews.text: We had similar fixtures in this location when we moved into the house. Over the years we tried replacing them with other stuyles and I am glad to have the same appearance now that we did then.
customer_reviews.author: mrose

customer_reviews.title: Improperly labeled listing
customer_reviews.text: This is listed as a 150w bulb max light. The box and the manufacturers website have it listed as 100w max. To our dismay, the cords were measured and cut before this oversight was noticed, so now we have these lights that are not bright enough for our salon. Thanks SeaGull!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Miles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fit for my hallway and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Summersun

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light indeed. Perfect size for a bathroom. Very easy to install. it's nice you can't see the bulb. No glare
customer_reviews.author: sed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just as I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just as I hoped for, replaced $700 pendant I purchased from a Manhattan store
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Eastchester

customer_reviews.title: Clean and modern
customer_reviews.text: The light is simple, clean and easy to install. It is in my kitchen and i use a warm 400 lumen LED bulb. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brown

customer_reviews.title: All arrived in good shape. Bulbs are not included
customer_reviews.text: Used several different size globes on a new building project. All arrived in good shape. Bulbs are not included. I used CFLs and they seem to be working just fine. Not good for LEDs as LEDs require air flow and can not be enclosed. Globe opening at top is only 4 inches. A regular spot light bulb will not fit as I want to use this for down lighting but ended up with just a regular Circular Florence light. Cords are only a couple of feet in length.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Menninger

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to change lightbulb.
customer_reviews.text: The pendent light is beautiful once installed, but, changing the lightbulb takes two people on stepladders. It involves completely removing the globe, inserting the bulb inside of globe, pulling the socket down, then reattaching the globe to the socket.
customer_reviews.author: FaireJane

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I installed 3 of them in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I installed 3 of them in my kitchen myself. They were easy to install and the shades are easy to take down to clean.
customer_reviews.author: courtney w

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light fixture. Decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these lights but I can't seem to find the right light bulb to put in them. The white glass taints the light.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for a simple lamp
customer_reviews.text: This hanging lamp is simply a glass globe, a few pieces of sheet metal to secure it, a wire, and some hardware for attachment to the ceiling electrical box. I find the price for such a simple item to be too expensive and should be priced at half the price I paid. As an engineer, I know what has to be done to make these items, and how high the profit margin is for the manufacturer and the middlemen.
customer_reviews.author: nghk

specifications.Warranty Description: All products purchased have a 30-day replacement parts policy to ensure a fully working item. All products are covered under a 1-year warranty when purchased on amazon. The warranty period begins on the day the product is originally shipped. The warranty covers all of the items and conditions identified in the original manufacturers warranty. Some of the items specifically not covered by the warranty are loss and theft, water damage, customer abuse, and finish detoriation due to uv or coastal exposure.
